abstract: Polish newspaper Gazeta Wyborcza publishes letter from former presidents Lech Walesa, Aleksander Kwasniewski and Bronislaw Komorowski warning actions of country's right-wing government threaten democracy.

headline.print_headline: Ex-Presidents of Poland Issue Rebuke to Government
headline.main: Ex-Presidents of Poland Issue a Rebuke to the Governing Party

snippet: An open letter from three former presidents, including Lech Walesa, and seven other politicians said the new right-wing government was a threat to democracy.
lead_paragraph: An open letter from three former presidents, including Lech Walesa, and seven other politicians said the new right-wing government was a threat to democracy.
